Reference

Available data

Data released with the package

Fitting functions

Functions to cluster the data.

S3 functions

The rcongas S3 object.

Plotting functions

Functions to plot data and fits.

Getters for clustering results

Functions to extract clustering information from a model.

Getters for input data

Functions to extract information of the data stored in a model.

Filter functions

Functions to filter out information from a model.

Synthetic data generation functions

Functions to sample from the generative model.

Other analyses (DE, GSE)

Differential Expression, Gene Set Enrichment, etc.
